traits.name: Fly
traits.description: The Character may move over terrain features unhindered.

traits.name: Pack Hunter
traits.description: Up to three of the same Character with this Trait may be Activated at the same time. In addition, they may re-roll a single failed Hit each if they attack the same target.

traits.name: Leader of the Pack
traits.description: A Character with this Trait may allow Creatures on the same or smaller base size within 8" to use their Bravery stat.

traits.name: Fearsome
traits.description: Any enemy character on a smaller base size within 3" of this Character must take an automatic Bravery Test.

traits.name: Agile
traits.description: A Character with this Trait may re-roll a single failed Leg It roll per Round.

traits.name: Monstrous Mount
traits.description:
Some Creatures can be ridden into battle by non-Creature Characters. Whilst mounted, riders count as being in Cover. Both riders and mounts are Activated at the same time and share the mount's base and movement Actions. Riders and mounts should be targeted separately by Attacks.

If mounts are Knocked Out, riders take D6 Hits and count as Prone. If riders are Knocked Out, the mount must take a Bravery Test.
